title: Aadhya Diamond Kadaa: Floral Splendor
materials: meticulously studded with brilliant-cut Cubic Zirconia (CZ) stones. Features a Hyderabadi polish for a lasting sheen and enhanced gold luster.
features: This Kadaa features a modern, floral-inspired design. Each floral motif is meticulously crafted with delicate CZ settings. The double-row design adds visual depth and sparkle. It has a secure clasp closure for ease of wear.
colors: Predominantly golden yellow with sparkling white/clear CZ stones.
occasions: and contemporary celebrations. Also suitable for adding a touch of elegance to everyday wear.
description: This Kadaa effortlessly blends modern aesthetics with traditional South Indian sensibilities. The floral design represents prosperity and new beginnings, making it an ideal gift or heirloom. The high-quality CZ stones provide diamond-like brilliance at an accessible price point. Expertly crafted by our Hyderabad artisans, the Aadhya Kadaa ensures lasting beauty and durability. The Hyderabadi polish gives it a radiant glow that complements any outfit.
